name: Phantomjs (+Plugins)
tagline: Scriptable Headless WebKit. With the plugins re-enabled.
body:
### Phantomjs +Plugins
This is a fork of the phantomjs project with plugin support added back in. That's it. Enjoy!

### Additional Dependencies
In addition to the main branch dependencies, you're going to need:
*libglib2.0-dev
*libx11-dev
*libxext-dev
*libfreetype6-dev
*libxcursor-dev
*libxrandr-dev
*libxv-dev
*libxi-dev
*libgstreamermm-0.10-dev
*xvfb (at runtime)

### Authors and Contributors
This particular fork is maintained by Ryan Bridges (@r3b). The goal is to stay up-to-date with @ariya's main project while keeping plugin support.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
